subject: United States Open (Golf)
Golf
United States Women's Open (Golf)
lead_paragraph: To prepare for the U.S. Women’s Open, a U.S.G.A. director suggested that the players study the 2007 men’s Open, a battle of attrition that was also held at Oakmont.
snippet: To prepare for the U.S. Women’s Open, a U.S.G.A. director suggested that the players study the 2007 men’s Open, a battle of attrition that was also held at Oakmont.
